activities.loc: Richland County Courtroom, Floor C, Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
Ignition Interlock Device Tampering/Failure to Install/Violate Court Order

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Pierre M. Burke

records.addlTxt:
11:25 AM Defendant Pierre M. Burke appeared by phone.  Attorney Steven G. Richards in court for Pierre M. Burke.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Richards states that there is a mutual agreement for him to withdraw. Attorney Richards asks to be discharged. PB concurs. Court grants Attorney Richards to withdraw. Court speaks that the defendant needs to be in person. PB was having issues connecting to zoom today and had to appear by phone. 

Court advises PB to call the public defenders office today.
Status conference scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Status conference on November 21, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Pierre M. Burke
Current: 306 Warah Street, Apt 3, Boscobel, WI 53805 United States  (Effective: 10-07-2022)
Prior: 105 W. Green St., Boscobel, WI 53805
Judge approved defendant's request to appear remotely. Must appear by Zoom video.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
4:00 PM Defendant Pierre M. Burke in court.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Richards appears with PB. Attorney Richards waives the formal reading and the preliminary hearing. Max penalties stated. PB agrees with waiving the preliminary hearing. Court binds over for trial. State will be filing the information. Attorney Richards enters a NG plea.
Status conference scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on October 7, 2022 at 11:00 am.

9:46 AM Defendant Pierre Burke appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Harper appears by video. Attorney Wynes appears by video.
State asks for $5,000 signature bond.
Blood or urine, on demand of law enforcement.

Attorney Wynes heard and doesn't object with a signature.

Court orders:
$5,000 signature bond.
Blood or urine, on demand of law enforcement.

Initial set for 08/03/22 at 3:30 PM
